boostSound.label: Boost Sound Filename
boostSound.tooltip: Boost Sound File Name. Leave empty to disable. File has to be inside plugin itself!

command.label: Boost Ticket Command
command.tooltip: Command for everyone to use a ticket. Default !boostticket

commandTicket.label: Tickets command
commandTicket.tooltip: Command for user to show how many tickets they have. Default !tickets

commandAdd.label: Add Ticket command
commandAdd.tooltip: Command for Caster to add tickets from user. Default !addTicket

commandRemove.label: Remove Ticket command
commandRemove.tooltip: Command for Caster to remove tickets from user. Default !removeTicket

commandTransfer.label: Transfer Ticket command
commandTransfer.tooltip: Command for user to transfer a ticket to another user. Default !transferTicket

languageBoost.value: {0} ueberspringt mit seinem/Ihrem Level die Queue PogChamp
languageBoost.label: languageBoost

languageAddTicket.value: {0} hat ein Boostticket bekommen und besitzt nun {1} davon!
languageAddTicket.label: languageAddTicket

languageRemoveTicket.value: {0} wurde ein Boostticket entfernt und besitzt nun {1} davon!
languageRemoveTicket.label: languageRemoveTicket

languageErrorNoTicket.value: {0} du hast leider keine Boosttickets mehr!
languageErrorNoTicket.label: languageErrorNoTicket

languageErrorUserCooldown.value: {0} du musst leider noch mindestens {1} Sekunden warten (User Cooldown).
languageErrorUserCooldown.label: languageErrorUserCooldown

languageErrorGlobalCooldown.value: {0} du musst leider noch mindestens {1} Sekunden warten (Global Cooldown).
languageErrorGlobalCooldown.label: languageErrorGlobalCooldown
